com.ojcoleman.europa.util

Class IntervalLong

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ojcoleman.europa.util.Interval<java.lang.Long>
      • com.ojcoleman.europa.util.IntervalLong

  • public class IntervalLong
extends Interval<java.lang.Long>
    Represents an integer numeric interval from a minimum to maximum value, [start, end].
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Field Summary

      java.lang.Long clamp(java.lang.Long v)

      java.lang.Long random(java.util.Random random)
      Get a random uniformly distributed value in the range [start, end] (inclusive).
      java.lang.Long range()
      Returns the range of this Interval: end - start.

      Translate a value from the unit interval [0, 1] to the corresponding value from this interval.

      • clamp

        public java.lang.Long clamp(java.lang.Long v)
        Description copied from class: Interval
        If the given value is less than the start of this interval then returns the start value. If the given value is greater than the end of this interval then returns the end value. Otherwise returns the given value.
        Specified by:
        clamp in class Interval<java.lang.Long>
